subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Mets have zeroed in on catcher Yorvit Torrealba, who played for the N.L. champion Colorado Rockies, and should offer him a multiyear deal worth perhaps as much as $5 million annually.
snippet: The Mets have zeroed in on catcher Yorvit Torrealba, who played for the N.L. champion Colorado Rockies, and should offer him a multiyear deal worth perhaps as much as $5 million annually.
